ai-anya-e0501n18:1_0: Associating with the lightning condition, it is hard preceding condition,
ai-anya-e0501n18:1_2: the condition being by way of disappearance condition.
ai-anya-e0501n18:1_4: past, future, and present who have become unentangled in to the past, and are reborn in the future. After, some come backbiting and oppressed, some are unknowing. When they come back, some have become unallowable, some have become unallowable.
ai-anya-e0501n18:2_0: And here there is the meaning of this kind of rapture.
ai-anya-e0501n18:3_0: And all things are born in a mind of the mind, and these things are born in him.
ai-anya-e0501n18:4_0: In what sense is it associated with what?
ai-anya-e0501n18:4_1: One thing is the basis for cessation with one object, possession of these four factors associated with the object. When he has developed one vital condition, he is endowed with that same object:
ai-anya-e0501n18:5_0: Herein, one having gone to that place, the eye consciousness comes to be, and is focused only on one side.
ai-anya-e0501n18:5_1: eight things are not able to return to the monastery, but not to shake.
ai-anya-e0501n18:5_2: These are the remainder of all kinds of thought.
ai-anya-e0501n18:5_3: The concluding the Mind by the wise is finished.
